title.rendered: Gracious condo in Portland’s West End

content.rendered:
Behind a cheery, red door in this handsome line of brick row houses lies a special Portland home! This is the only condo in the association that boasts a private entrance from Park Street & has direct access from the back courtyard. Gracious in style and size, this unit was renovated to the studs with timeless updates.

 

The oversized living room features high ceilings, a wall of built-ins, and a charming fireplace surround. Custom cabinetry in the mudroom hides a clever work station. The kitchen is bright & efficient, with a Viking gas range & floor-to-ceiling storage. There’s plenty of space for dining, or continue out the back door for patio access & a grill! Marble-tiled floor & shower and a custom vanity in the bath make a modern statement. Enjoy the convenience of a reserved parking space, in-unit W/D & additional storage in the basement. Steps to all of Portland’s favorite dining & entertainment locales!
